helpText: Ж_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________Я.

generic.title: Ж_Error updating categories__________________________Я
generic.message: Ж_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________Я.

maxDepthExceeded.title: Ж_Error updating categories__________________________Я
maxDepthExceeded.message: Ж_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________Я.

destinationHasSameName.title: Ж_Error updating categories__________________________Я
destinationHasSameName.message: Ж_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________Я.

noSchema.title: Ж_Schema not found_________________Я
noSchema.message: Ж_Item schema not found for user_________________Я.

maxCharacter.title: Ж_Error updating categories__________________________Я
maxCharacter.message: Ж_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________Я.

deleteInUseCategory.title: Ж_Delete category________________Я
deleteInUseCategory.message: Ж_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________Я.

custom.title: Ж_Custom categories__________________Я
custom.message: Ж_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________Я.

arcgis.title: Ж_ArcGIS categories__________________Я
arcgis.message: Ж_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________Я.

iso.title: Ж_ISO categories_______________Я
iso.message: Ж_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________Я.

inspire.title: Ж_INSPIRE categories___________________Я
inspire.message: Ж_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________Я.
